job_history.work_description: Taught various courses including Strength and Conditioning, Personal Health, and Introduction to Sports Management.

Supervised and/or performed day-to-day functions of Fitness Specialists, Fitness Coaches, Interns, and Fitness Consults. Hired, trained, and evaluated fitness specialists and interns, compiled and reported outcome metrics, and monitored quality in all fitness testing aspects.
Taught the fundamentals of exercise and fitness principles to beginner exercisers and adults with chronic diseases.
Provided personal training services to clients.

education.domain: Psychology and Sports Medicine Fitness Management

skills.name: Fitness Instruction
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience teaching various fitness courses, including Strength and Conditioning, Personal Health, and Introduction to Sports Management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Personal Training
skills.explanation: Provided personal training services to clients for over a decade, suggesting expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised and/or performed day-to-day functions of Fitness Specialists, Fitness Coaches, Interns, and Fitness Consults, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Fitness Management
skills.explanation: Compiled and reported outcome metrics, monitored quality in all fitness testing aspects, and hired, trained, and evaluated fitness specialists and interns, suggesting strong proficiency in fitness management.

skills.name: Sports Management
skills.explanation: Taught Introduction to Sports Management, showing a solid working proficiency in sports management.

skills.name: Group Fitness Instruction
skills.explanation: Holds multiple certifications in group fitness instruction, including BOSU, Schwinn Cycling, Group Power, and others, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.explanation: Published an article in the Galter LifeCenter Member Newsletter, showing a solid working proficiency in communication.
